text: E fo, Godɨn otivir osɨmtɨziba ko aghumsɨzir araziba, da gumazamizibagh amima, me uan navibagh iraghrasi. Arazir kamɨn God uam en akura. Kamaghɨn, e arazir kam bagh uan navibagh isɨn nɨghnɨzir avɨribara amuan markiam. Ezɨ nguazir kamɨn osɨmtɨziba ko aghumsɨzir araziba, da gumazamizibagh amima ovevem otifi.
